nodes.text: A shoe was a type of footwear. Shoes were typically fastened with shoelaces.

The Twi'lek Bib Fortuna, a scheming member of Jabba the Hutt's entourage, wore soft-soled shoes for silent creeping. Elan Sel'Sabagno, a notorious Coruscanti slythmonger, wore shoes containing secret storage compartments for contraband.
